In 2022, the European Commission also published a proposal for a new EU Nature Restoration Law. This proposal, which at the time of writing is being discussed by Member States and the European Parliament, sets an EU-level objective to have nature restoration measures in place on at least 20% of EU land and sea by 2030, and have measures in place for all ecosystems in need of restoration by 2050 ( [EU Commission, 2022](https://environment.ec.europa.eu/publications/nature-restoration-law_en)).
